cast.overview: A tale of outsized ambition and outrageous excess, tracing the rise and fall of multiple characters in an era of unbridled decadence and depravity during Hollywood's transition from silent films to sound films in the late 1920s.
cast.title: Babylon

details.biography: Manny Liotta, founder of PARTYINFILM, a brand in which creatives indulge in stylized, fantastical filmmaking,  studied acting his entire youth, performing in over 20 theater productions and a handful of feature films. Since 2014 he has studied directing and screenwriting,  directing over 11 short films and having written over 9 feature screenplays. He has worked every job on his sets including the role of the editor of every single film he has directed. He is located in both Los Angeles, California and Cleveland, Ohio, bouncing back and forth to make movies in different areas of the United States. He is slated to direct his feature film debut in 2025.
details.name: Manny Liotta
